data.text: “Job, it is okay that you continue to cry out for someone to help you,
Foolish people die because of being ◄resentful/very angry at someone►;
I have seen foolish people who seemed to be successful/prosperous,
Their sons are never safe;
Hungry people steal the crops that foolish people harvest, and eat those crops;
But evil circumstances/sufferings are not produced by the soil;
People have troubles from the time that they are born
“If I were suffering like you are, I would ask God for help
He does great things, things that we cannot understand;
He sends rain on the ground;
He exalts those who are humble,
He causes crafty/cunning people to not be able to do what they plan to do,
He causes people who think that they [IRO] are wise to be trapped by the cunning things they try to do,
It is as though even in the daytime they are covered by darkness,
But God saves helpless people from being harmed by what wicked people say [MTY],
So, poor people confidently expect that good things will happen to them
“But those whom God corrects/rebukes are happy;
He wounds people, but then he puts bandages on those wounds;
He will rescue you many times from your troubles,
When there is a famine, he will not allow you to die,
God will protect you when people slander [MTY] you;
You will be able to laugh/scoff when things are destroyed and when there is famine,
You will not worry about having big rocks in your fields that will make plowing difficult,
In your tent, you will know that things will go well for you,
You will be sure that you will have many descendants,
You will become very old before you die,
“My friends and I have thought carefully about these things, and we know that they are true,
